Ostler: Bill Russell documentary might be too enlightening for certain parts of U.S.

Don’t think a schoolteacher in one of the hate states couldn’t get fired or arrested for showing their pupils “Bill Russell: Legend.” Florida’s Duval County recently banned from schools a young-adult book titled, “Hank Aaron’s Dream.” Also banned: books on Jackie Robinson, Roberto Clemente and Rosa Parks.

Officials working to ensure equal access at ultimate Bay Area surf school beach
